name: typescript-junie-project
description: TypeScript project configured for Junie Agent in IntelliJ IDEA

scripts.dist: npm run build && cp package.json package-lock.json dist/ && cd dist && npm install --production --ignore-scripts
scripts.package:lambda: npm run build && cp package.json package-lock.json dist/ && cd dist && npm install --production --ignore-scripts && zip -r ../lambda.zip .
scripts.package:docker: npm run dist && docker build --platform linux/arm64 -t qlibin/browser-lambda:latest .
scripts.package:docker:push: aws ecr get-login-password --region $AWS_REGION| docker login --username AWS --password-stdin $AWS_ACCOUNT_ID.dkr.ecr.$AWS_REGION.amazonaws.com && docker tag qlibin/browser-lambda:latest $AWS_ACCOUNT_ID.dkr.ecr.$AWS_REGION.amazonaws.com/qlibin/browser-lambda:latest && docker push $AWS_ACCOUNT_ID.dkr.ecr.$AWS_REGION.amazonaws.com/qlibin/browser-lambda:latest

author: Development Team
